manipulators.description: CapsLock click equal to ESC press equal to hyper
Move to the beginning of the previous word
Move to the end of the previous word
Move to the beginning of the current line
Move to the end of the current line
Move to the top of the current page
Selection to the beginning of the previous word
Selection to the end of the previous word
Selection to the beginning of the current line
Selection to the end of the current line
Selection to the top of the current page
Selection to the beginning of the document
Selection to the end of the document
Switch foreground app hyper + shift + n (next)
Switch foreground app hyper + shift + p (previous)
go to the next desktop use hyper + n
go to the next desktop use hyper + p

rules.description: map fn->left_cmd everything except (terminal, iterm, and all IDEs)
map fn->left_ctl for terminal, iterm, and all IDEs
Swap left-ctrl and command except (terminal, iterm, and all IDEs)
Swap left-ctrl and command except in Terminal
